name: Streaming BiqQuery data through DLP to transform data flex template
description: Python flex template for streaming BiqQuery data through regional DLP to transform the data.

parameters.name: query
parameters.label: SQL query to retrieve input data.
parameters.helpText: Input query to retrieve data from Dataset. Example: `SELECT * FROM PROJECT.DATASET.TABLE LIMIT 100`.

parameters.name: input_table
parameters.label: BigQuery input table name.
parameters.helpText: Input BigQuery table for results specified as: PROJECT:DATASET.TABLE or DATASET.TABLE.

parameters.name: deidentification_template_name
parameters.label: DLP Structured De-identification Template Name.
parameters.helpText: Name of the DLP Structured De-identification Template that was used to deidentify data in the BiqQuery source. Format is 'projects/<PROJECT>/locations/<LOCATION>/deidentifyTemplates/<TEMPLATE_ID>'

parameters.name: window_interval_sec
parameters.label: Window interval in seconds.
parameters.helpText: Window interval in seconds for grouping incoming messages.

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.label: DLP batch size.
parameters.helpText: Number of records to be sent in a batch in the call to the DLP API.

parameters.name: dlp_location
parameters.label: DLP Location.
parameters.helpText: The Location of the DLP template resource.

parameters.name: dlp_project
parameters.label: DLP Project.
parameters.helpText: ID of the project that holds the DLP template.

parameters.name: bq_schema
parameters.label: BigQuery table schema.
parameters.helpText: Output BigQuery table schema specified as string with format: FIELD_1:STRING,FIELD_2:STRING,...

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: BigQuery output table name.
parameters.helpText: Output BigQuery table with reidentified data as: PROJECT:DATASET.TABLE or DATASET.TABLE.

parameters.name: dlp_transform
parameters.label: DLP transformation type.
parameters.helpText: Choose between DLP DE-IDENTIFY or RE-IDENTIFY.
